model Item {
    fields {
        price Decimal
        quantity Number
        total Decimal @computed(item.quantity * item.price)
    }
}

===

model Item {
    fields {
        price Decimal
        quantity Number
        total Decimal
    }
}

===

DROP FUNCTION item__total__0614a79a__comp;
DROP TRIGGER item__comp ON item;
DROP FUNCTION item__exec_comp_fns;

===

[
  {"Model":"Item","Field":"total","Type":"MODIFIED"}
]
